sentences.en: Again a diagonal farrows works exactly the same as a normal farrow.
sentences.cn: 重复一下,斜向向前拉线和通常的向前拉线效果完全相同.

sentences.en: As Selah Hennessy reports from London, Farrow's and White's testimonies contradict Campbell's statements given last week.
sentences.cn: 根据记者西拉?轩尼诗于伦敦的报导,法罗和怀特的证词与坎贝尔上周给出的证词相矛盾.

sentences.en: Duke Farrow: I am your king!
sentences.cn: 范罗公爵: 我是你的君主!

sentences.en: Farrow, who was also a guest of Mr.
sentences.cn: 法罗当时也是曼德拉的客人.
范罗公爵: 我是你地君主!

sentences.en: Ireland is the old sow that eats her farrow.
sentences.cn: 爱尔兰就像是吞食自己小猪的母猪.

sentences.en: One kind of operation is called a farrow - to - wean farm.
sentences.cn: 有一种养殖方式叫从产崽到断奶养殖场.

sentences.en: Our sow had 15 at one farrow.
sentences.cn: 我们的母猪一胎下了15个小猪.

sentences.en: Why can't I have a farrow and a barrow on the same player?
sentences.cn: 为什么我不能设置同一名球员的前拉线和后拉线?
